name: Gaze Into The Cheese Pit
description:
*WARNING* !RATHER LOUD AUDIO! *WARNING*

A monster that hungers for grilled cheese is attacking the city! Get in the ship and feed it with the debris of the cheese planet it previously destroyed. Good Luck Soldier.

CONTROLS:

WASD - movement

Spacebar [hold] - shoot

Shift - Switch Push/Pull mode

An Entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 - "Joined Together"
